item.description:
HI North Shore puggers-

Please come to a pug meet up at 73 Valley Street, Salem, MA 01970. We have a huge fenced in yard so you don't have to worry about letting the puggies off leash. There is plenty of parking on the street and the side streets too. All memebers are welcome if weather permitting. Hope to see you then! Feel free to contact me with any questions.

Alissa & Buster

group.name: The Northshore MA Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem Pug July Meetup
